page.title: 03General Description 3
page.content: The area offers little in the way of entertainment for the under 18's but their is a youth club which meets during the winter and an institute where anyone can play snooker or badminton.The village also has a football team for under 12's,under16's and an amateur team which plays in the Dumfries League.There is a bowling club and,for the O.A.P.'s,an Evergreen Club but this is as far as entertainment facilities go.Shops tend to be limited in their selections and,because of carriage charges,more expensive than normal.This means that most people do their main buying out of Moniaive.Tourism helps the area and many visitors come each year to fish,walk or simply enjoy the scenery.A preparity school called Crawfordton House is 2mls.out of the village but very few locals attend it.
